original_text: On the tenth day of the fifth month, in the nineteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard, who served the king of Babylon, came to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 열아홉째 해 다섯째 달 열째 날에 바벨론 왕의 어전 사령관 느부사라단이 예루살렘에 이르러

sentences.original_text: On the tenth day of the fifth month
in the nineteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard
who served the king of Babylon
